name: Splosion
description:
Splosion

Get to the end of the level before time runs out. Collecting as many pickups as you can.

Hold space for slow motion, click on the black area to create an explosion. 

NOTE:

This game was originally meant for the 2 color Jam before realizing they wanted a 2d pixel art look. I've started using it for testing build automation so whenever I make a change to the game, it's live within 20 minutes. The game will receive a few updates while I get a solid process worked out for automating builds to Itch.
